external_references.description: Jamie Tarabay and Katrina Manson. (2023, December 22). Iranian-Linked Hacks Expose Failure to Safeguard US Water System. Retrieved March 25, 2024.

objects.description: During the [Unitronics Defacement Campaign](https://attack.mitre.org/campaigns/C0031), the [CyberAv3ngers](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G1027) caused multiple businesses to halt operations in their industrial environments, impacting their typical business operations. These victims covered multiple sectors.(Citation: Jamie Tarabay and Katrina Manson December 2023)
